thread.title: Jamie
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Jamie

author: Jamie
title: Jamie
text: My skin is dry and the amount of chlorine and other elements in my local water were creating havoc on my skin and making me itch horribly after emerging from a shower. I was online searching for a possible solution when I came across the Pelican Shower Filter. I figured it was worth a try. After the first shower with the filter installed I was sold forever. Great product, works as described, easy to install and autoship makes it a no brainer. I have recommended this product to friends who report that the Pelican worked as well for them. Also, great customer service!
